Description:
Family home, north facing
Located in the highly sought after Delaray Estate is this beautiful home comes with all the benefits which Club Delaray is offering right now which includes fully-equipped gym, tennis court, four lane lap pool, resort-style play pool, café, function room and theatrette with cinema facilities, library, parents' lounge, community garden, men's shed, close to all the amenities and proudly boasting:
- 4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR
- Spacious kitchen with quality appliances
- Open plan living and dining area
- Double lock up garage with internal access
Extras include: - gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, downlights, solar hot water system, recycled water, low maintenance front yard and backyard, quality blinds, light fittings and many more
Call now to inspect

Description:
Vendor must sell!
Enjoy prestigious living in the booming and popular Selandra Rise estate in Clyde North. This quality home has it all! Features - four large bedrooms, family and meals area, theatre room, children's play area, 9ft ceilings, porcelain floor tiles, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, intercom and alarm system, rear access and entretainer's alfresco.
From the moment you enter the home, youll be in awe, taking in the dream master bedroom with huge separate his and her walk in robes (no more sharing closet space), a gorgeous ensuite, complete with double vanities and oversized shower and separate toilet.
At the heart of the home is a bright and modern kitchen with gleaming tiled splash-back and granite bench tops and breakfast bar, a 900ml upright gas stove, dishwasher, and abundant storage with cupboards, pot drawers and walk in pantry.
Adjoining is the meals and family zone, a great area for family and friends to socialise. Family movie nights are made special in your own theatre room or formal lounge. Three other bedrooms feature in their own separate zone, serviced by a modern family bathroom and childrens play or study area. All this is complimented by an inviting under-cover alfresco area perfect for entertaining, a large double remote garage with rear roller door and lush green backyard, all located on a 554m2 corner block.
Only a hop, skip and a jump away from Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, parks and waterways. Enjoy the convenience of walking your children to Wilandra Rise Primary or St Peter's College and Cranbourne East Primary/Secondary schools, Cranbourne Aquatic and Entertainment Centre and Library and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and train station just a short drive away and a bus stop at your door. This is a beautiful home in a great location. Call Teresa on 0490 815 630 for inspection, you won't be disappointed!

Description:
BEAUTIFUL FAMILY HOME IN A PERFECT LOCATION
Here is a great opportunity for any first home buyer or investor. This property is ready for you to move in and enjoy. Rarely does a property which ticks all these boxes come onto the market at such a fantastic price.
Conveniently located in the heart of Clyde North , just few minutes’ walk to Woolworth, Dan Murphy’s, Aspire Church, Selandra Rise retirement, Selandra rise family and children Center, Wilandra Rise primary school… Few minutes’ drive to Casey shopping centre, library, Chisholm TAFE and Casey Grammar, Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary schools, Cranbourne Park Shopping Complex, Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre and Cranbourne Train Station and so much more that this family friendly suburb has to offer.
With a functional floor plan offering multiple indoor and outdoor living options for the growing family, this high quality home offers:
• Master bedroom with FES and a large WIR
• 3 more generous sized bedrooms with BIR
• 2 Bathrooms and toilets
• Open living and dining area
• Spectacular kitchen featuring 900mm upright stainless steel oven/cooker & dishwasher.
• Island bench with plenty storage space.
• Alfresco entertainment for family & friends
• Ducted heating system
• High Ceiling
• Security alarm system
• Double garage with rear and internal access
Contact Binh Tran or Phuc Le for a viewing today!
Disclaimer: All information about the property has been provided to Le & Co Estate Agents by third parties. Le & Co Estate Agents has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to the property.

Description:
Spaciously perfect for your family
This breathtaking home offers luxury living space, perfect for those who demand the very best in life, be swept away by the innovative design of this immaculate home, offering an open floor plan and all the creature comforts one would desire. Set on a sizeable 347SQM block.
- Boasting high ceilings throughout transforming an even bigger Open Plan living
- Master with Ensuite and Walk in Wardrobe.
- Quality floating floor, carpet
- Ducted heating
- Internal access from double lockup garage
- Low maintenance private backyard with plenty of room for your kids to play or your furry friends.
Huge kitchen/meals area with stone benchtops and walk in pantry. The location doesn't get any better than this it's within walking distance to all the amenities, shops, schools, transportation and parks.
To avoid disappointment call Brad Spencer today 0439 899 920.

Description:
Luxury and Elegance in Berwick Waters
In a quiet yet incredibly convenient berwick waters neighbourhood, this two-storey home is a rare gem for a modern family
Immaculate downstairs comprises large office space with separate entrance, master with walkin robes & eusuite, modern kitchen with large pantry, smeg cooktop, oven and dishwasher, separate meals & family space, rumpus room, second bedroom with its own lounge & bathroom, and walking up the stairs with elegant chandelier you will find another spacious living are, two more bedrooms and a bathroom with spa. Three stacker doors open to covered alfresco with designer backyard with ample space for kids to play and entertain friends over summer BBQ
This home comes with
- Designer landscaping front and back
- High ceilings
- Downlights in hallway, living, kitchen, rumpus
- Panel life remote garage door with roller door to access backyard
- Solar panels (3 kw)
- Security doors
- Refrigerated Heating & Cooling
- Blinds

Located in the highly sought-after Clyde Springs Estate is this ideal piece of land comes with the following features: -
North facing
12.9m frontage
23.92m deep
No easements
And comes with all the benefits which Clyde Springs Estate is currently offering including the extensive bus services, walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre, train station, access to Monash freeway, South Gippsland Highway, surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland, within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse, Library, an easy half an hour drive to the beach, close to the Chisholm TAFE, Federation University, Hillcrest and Rivercrest college and other quality schools in the area, close to the Fountain Gate, Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Central, Pasadena, Hunt Club, Spring Hill, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and the new centre proposed on Hardys Road, not to mention the mountain views, recycled water for lush green gardens and many more.

Description:
TITLED CORNER BLOCK LAND DELARAY ESTATE 563SQM!
Titled Land- Delaray Waters
Delaray Waters is a new master planned community that will boast a blend of stylish homes, tree-lined streets, parks in each precinct, and a range of local amenity.
Upon entering Delaray Waters, it's easy to see how these lots are selling fast. Immaculately presented, with pedestrian and cycle paths, neighbourhood parks in each precinct, all with leisure facilities for use year-round. Only a stone's throw away from Berwick, multiple school options & Monash freeway access will ensure that this location will only appreciate as time goes by.
As part of the wider Delaray community, youll also belong to the exclusive Residents Club. With its distinctive architectural design, Club Delaray will be the heart of the community. With its swimming pools, fully-equipped gym, café, and venue space; nothing else compare
Call Elias Salimi on 0412 676 898 for further information.
Please note. This is an advertising brochure only. Rexhepi Real Estate has prepared this brochure on the instructions of the vendor in order to advertise the property. We have not verified the accuracy of the information contained within. You should not rely on this brochure as proof of the facts stated. You should independently verify the matters stated in this brochure before making your decision to purchase. Description:
The one you've been looking for!
Located in the award winning Selandra Rise estate is this sensational Carlisle built home comprising three bedrooms plus a study, or could be set up as a three bedroom with three living areas! Still under builders warranty, this home is perfect for growing families, a clever investor or a lucky first home buyer. This 26 square home is located in a quiet street overlooking Clyde Creek and Wilandra Rise Primary School. With a feature facade, exposed aggregate driveway and fully landscaped garden, this home is sure to catch your eye.
Upon walking through the front door, you will be impressed by it's spacious feel and quality finishes. Located at the front of the property is the master bedroom, complete with walk in robe and full ensuite including double vanity and rainfall shower head. The remaining bedrooms located off the hallway have built in robes and are generous in size. In addition to these rooms is a study, which could easily be converted to a 4th bedroom or additional living area, depending on your needs.
At the heart of this home is the entertainers kitchen which boasts a walk in pantry, glass splashback, 900mm gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances and an Electrolux dishwasher. The kitchen flows effortlessly into the open plan dining and living areas and through to the decked under roofline alfresco. At the rear corner of the property is a large rumpus, perfect for the kids, a home theatre or entertaining guests.
The home overflows with additional features including:
- Extra high 2590mm ceilings
- Security system, video intercom and tri-lock security doors
- High quality floor coverings and window furnishings
- Gas ducted heating, 3 reverse cycle air conditioners and fans throughout
- LED downlights in the entry, master bedroom, kitchen, dining, living, hallway and rumpus
- Outdoor awnings on the north facing windows in the main living area
- Aluminium window frames with fly screens and key locks
- Fully landscaped, low maintenance garden
- Remote double garage with internal access
Selandra Rise was designed to offer everything residents need - for home, work or leisure - all within easy walking distance. This includes schools, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, local employment and aged care services as well as open space, parks, playgrounds and walking tracks. The location of this property is second to none and is ready for you to call home.
This property is available for private inspection most days. Just send us an email enquiry and we will automatically respond with the available open times.
To ensure there is enough demand to inspect the property, please advise us of your wish to attend by simply following these instructions.
- Book inspection
- Select a date and time based on the options displayed
- Enter your details
- Select 'register inspection time'
You're finished! We'll keep you updated if anything changes, but otherwise we look forward to meeting you at our Hodges Open for Inspection.
**Photo ID required at ALL inspections.
** Investors: Did you know Hodges Real Estate Casey has the highest Google ranking for Property Management in the Casey? Our department head of rentals Melissa Doughton has appraised this property at $380 p/w - $390p/w for more details about leasing contact Melissa on 03 5996 5993 today.

Beautiful & Modern 4 Bedroom Home with 3 Living Areas!
Here is a great opportunity for any first home buyer or investor. This Porter Davis built home is near new and ready for you to move in and enjoy. Rarely does a property which ticks all these boxes come onto the market at such a fantastic price.
With lovely floorboards and fresh neutral colour tones throughout, this property will attract the attention of multiples buyers and families as it has loads to offer including 4 great sized bedrooms, master with ensuite including double vanitity with stone benchtops and oversized walk in robe, whilst the remaining three bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
Additional Features include:
-3 Living areas
-Gas Ducted heating
-High Ceilings
-High Doors
-Evaporative cooling
-Downlights
-Great size kitchen fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and 40mm stone island benchtop
-Glass splashback and soft close doors in kitchen
-Walk in pantry
-Fantastic natural lighting throughout the house
-Study nook
-3rd Toilet
-Undercover Alfresco
-Spacious backyard for all the family's needs
Conveniently located in the heart of Clyde North and will be sure to attract the attention of many buyers and investors. So be sure to get in quick for a chance to own this gorgeous home.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
ST.GERMAIN ESTATE, CLYDE NORTH: **GOVERNMENT GRANTS APPLICABLE TO ALL APPROVED FIRST HOME BUYERS** Looking for a brand new home without the hassles of dealing with a builder? Wanting a modern contemporary residence? Searching for a popular up and coming location? Keen to add to your thriving rental portfolio? Then look no further, your wish is my command!
This is practical, spacious family living at its best - a complete turn key package nestled on a low maintenance, care free cottage block. Perfect for first home buyers looking to make use of the Government Grants, investors seeking long term capital growth and empty nesters wishing to downsize into a secure, thriving location.
The functional floorplan includes 4 genuine robed bedrooms, the master with a full ensuite and walk in robe, a family bathroom with separate bath/shower facilities plus a hostess kitchen. Not forgetting the spacious open plan family/meals zones, the remote single lock up garage with convenient internal walkway access and the cosy courtyard.
Complete with a long list of extras including:
- Gas ducted heating
- 3.5kW split system air-conditioning unit
- Floor boards to all walkways, carpeted bedrooms
- Downlights to the main living area
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900mm rangehood/cook top/oven
- 20mm stone bench tops to the kitchen and both bathrooms
- Standard roller blinds
- Instantaneous/solar hot water service
- Turn key options including landscaping to both the front and rear yards, coloured concrete driveway, letter box and a wall hung clothesline
Located in Melbourne's South East, St. Germain is close to many recreational and lifestyle activities. The development is close to a variety of shopping options, including Casey Central, Eden Rise Village and Selandra Rise Shopping Centre for everyday necessities. If you are looking for an intimate experience and enjoy local street shops you can head down to High Street, Berwick where there are various cafes, restaurants and bakeries. Otherwise, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre is approximately 12 kilometres away! If you are travelling further afield its approximately 30 minutes from the lovely coastal towns of Mornington or about 45 Minutes from Melbourne's CBD.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call now before it's selling, selling..... SOLD!
MAKE AN ENQUIRY TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Titled Block in Berwick Waters!
Located in Berwick Waters is this enticing block which may well be the site of your next brand new home. The flat, rectangular block measures in at 576sqm (approx.) with an excellent street frontage of approximately 18 meters and a depth of 32 meters. With such a wide frontage the block lends itself to possibilities such as a triple garage, side access or a wider ranch styled home, all subject to the relevant council and developer approvals. The block is positioned backing onto a forest reserve ensuring the utmost peace and tranquillity are on offer. Living in such a great locale offers the opportunity to be nearby to schools, public transport, shops and freeway access. The area itself is zoned for St. Catherine's Primary, Chase Primary, St. Francis Xavier Berwick and Kambrya Secondary. To discover more about this exciting opportunity – don't hesitate to get in touch.

SOLD BY TEAM RAGHU
"Titled Flat Rectangular Block in St Germain Estate - LOT 526"
The well sized titled block in prime position located in St Germain Estate is located on Thompsons Road, just 10 minutes from the Princes Freeway (M1) and Berwick. Part of the booming southeastern corridor, it is only 45 minutes from Melbourne’s CBD and 30 minutes from the beautiful coastal towns of the Mornington Peninsula.
The St Germain Estate is to have the new addition of retail strip 12 retail shops, alongside restaurants, cafes, childcare facilities, a gym, and office space with modern offices, a retirement village, aged care facility and regional medical centre.
Get in contact with us now about this rare block that has become available in the exclusive St Germain Estate

Description:
Sit back, relax and enjoy
This Henley family home flows beautifully and leads you to the hub of the property and has a versatile floorplan. Boasting only 2 years young and located in the heart of a dynamic estate named Clydevale.
Important features including:-
- Master suite with full ensuite, 2 massive walk in robes & double vanities.
- Hostess kitchen offering quality stone bench top and butler pantry
- Theatre room or study or even a huge 4th bedroom
- Ducted heating, split cooling system & ceiling fans
- Double car accommodation with internal access and remote control
- Landscaped front and back with low maintenance & facing parkland
- And many more modern upgrades throughout
Relax into the privacy of your very own spa fully enclosed after a hard day's work. Furthermore, there is natural gas and water connections at the rear ideal for future outdoor kitchen.
Easy access to Linsell Boulevard & Berwick Cranbourne Rds. Short distance to Selandra Shopping Centre including Woolworth, gymnasium and specialty shops. Also close to Wilandra Rise Primary School, St Peters College, Kids on Clyde and St Thomas Primary School.
Photo ID required for all inspections
Insights: 28 Clydevale Avenue, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Sale By Set Date – 2/10/2018 at 6pm
Located in an ever-popular pocket of Clyde North in Berwick Waters on a sweeping private drive is this wonderful near new home ready and waiting for you. This stunning double storey home offers three bedrooms and two separate living areas across a clever floor plan. Upon entering the property you'll note that an open plan kitchen, meals and living area allows plenty of room for family, friends and entertaining.
The kitchen hosts a generous pantry along with stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops with plenty of storage space. Outside to the rear of the property a covered alfresco overlooks manicured gardens ensuring low-maintenance living all year round. Coming back inside and heading upstairs you'll note three generous bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in-robe alongside a central bathroom and a generous family room with built-in study nook. Comforts and conveniences include ducted heating and cooling, internal access, fully landscaped gardens & powder room downstairs. Location is superb offering easy access to local schools, shops and the M1 freeway.
The property is currently leased until 8th March 2019 at a rate of $1,733 per calendar month. Whether you're looking for a great investment return or to establish yourself in a great area be sure to call today to register your interest, as opportunities such as this do not last long!
Insights: 25 Elmtree Crescent, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.
